provisions.title: Imposition of Special Import Levy
provisions.content: There is imposed by this Act for the years 2013, 2014, and 2015, a Special Import Levy on imported goods to be paid at the point of entry and to be computed on the Cost, Insurance and Freight (CIF) value of the goods. provisions.title: Administration of Levy

provisions.title: Assessment, collection and recovery of Levy
provisions.content: The Customs, Excise and Preventive Service (Management) Act, 1993 (P.N.D.L. 330) applies for the assessment, collection and recovery of the Levy imposed and for related matters with the necessary modifi­cations. provisions.title: Payment into the Consolidated Fund
provisions.content: The Commissioner-General of the Ghana Revenue Authority shall pay all amounts collected under this Act into the Consolidated Fund. The Commissioner-General of the Ghana Revenue Authority shall pay all amounts collected under this Act into the Consolidated Fund.

provisions.title: Interpretation
provisions.content: In this Act, unless the context otherwise requires;“Commissioner-General” means the Commissioner-General appointed under section 13 of the Ghana Revenue Authority Act, 2009 (Act 791); and“Levy” means the Special Import Levy imposed under section 1.
